title: Sick of this, I'm uninstalling...
body: The drive I installed LoL on is full and I'm sick and tired of deleting stuff to update LoL, I'm uninstalling so I can redownload the game on another drive {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Coincidentally, Riot Daugava moonlights as a PC salesperson.
And happens to sell a special software which makes you computer dedicated to only one game.
